VIII.iv.4.A.5.k
.
SMC for Bilateral Blindness With Bilateral Hearing Loss Considered 30-Percent Disabling
A Veteran is entitled to an additional full step in the level of SMC, not to exceed that provided by
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
and
38 CFR 3.350(f)(2)(vi)
, if the SC disabilities include
visual acuity of 5/200 (1.5/60) or less, bilaterally
bilateral hearing loss, considered 30-percent disabling, and
SC hearing loss in one ear.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A
